description:
This course has 9 lectures which focus on the finer concepts when trading binary options.

  1. Fibonacci Retracements

    In this video Sam covers the basics of Fibonacci Retracement and how it can be used effectively to trade binary options.

  2. Support and Resistance

    Sam teaches horizontal support and resistance and dynamic support and resistance.

  3. Trend Lines

    As with all support and resistance, trend support and resistance is highly effective and is widely used by many retail and corporate traders.

  4. Market Types

    An insight into ranging and trending markets, and how both markets can be traded.

  5. Pattern Formations

    An overview of what these patterns are, why they are formed, and how they can be traded.

  6. Chart Setups

    Sam gives some examples of reliable chart setups to use when trading binary options.

  7. Expiry Times

    Sam gives his own opinion of what expiry times to use and which time frames to analyse.

  8. Advanced News Trading

    In this video you will learn how to read scheduled news forecasts and trade using announced economic figures.

  9. Hedging Strategies

    This video demonstrates how to hedge ranging markets and the benefits for doing so.

Once you have completed this course you will be able use simple and slightly complex strategies to take your trading to the next level.
title: Binary Options Course - Level 2
